messageBody:
So said Arvind Sharma on 2002-12-19 --------------------

>Hi,
> I am new to junit framework. I want to know what
>will be the best way to write test classes for Action
>Listeners of a Swing GUI. I mean how do we to test the
>objects of Action Listener Classes.

1. Pick a particular Action Listener that you'd like to test.
2. Pick one part of its behavior that you want to test -- for example,
its response to a specific event.
3. Use a JUnit test to send an event to the listener.
4. Verify that the listener tries to do the right thing.

If/when you run into trouble with this, we'll talk about Mock Objects;
but until then, do what you can and report the results.

Good luck.
